attributes.action: allow smoking in visitors cars parked in hospital car parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When visiting friends or relatives in hospital, the desire to have a quick smoke to relieve the tension whilst sitting in the car before and after the visit and driving home is overwhelming.How on Earth can this stupid ban be legally enforceable?
In constant pain, I see consultants maybe 4 times a year.  I take a flask, have a ciggy before and a ciggy before driving home.
Have not yet been challenged, but a Glasgow Kiss might be my reaction!!!
We aren't harming anyone else with our smoke!  Nanny state.
They've also started restricting drinking(or trying to) with the "drink wisely" programme.
I don't know about you, but-after four pints, I'm anything but wise, though it does increase my accuracy with the darts!
